name: Astrocreep: Homecoming (David Mills - Game Developer!)
description:
This is a 3D prelude to the original "Astrocreep"! It is part of a series about an ALIEN THAT ASSIMILATES OTHER ORGANISMS ( LIKE "THE THING" ). Consider playing another in the series if this kind of subject interest you:


Astrocreep Invasion is getting a 3D remake currently in development!
